scripts.build: npm run copy-icons && npm run copy-fonts && npm run copy-images && concurrently "npx tailwindcss -i ./Modules/Frontend/resources/assets/sass/app.scss -o ./public/build-frontend/css/app.css" "vite build"
scripts.dev: npm run copy-icons && npm run copy-fonts && npm run copy-images && concurrently "npx tailwindcss -i ./Modules/Frontend/resources/assets/sass/app.scss -o ./public/build-frontend/css/app.css --watch" "vite"
